items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA): Independent Panel terms of reference
items.summary: The Independent Panel terms of reference ensures fair and consistent assessment of claims from postmasters under the HSSA scheme.

items.title: Make Work Pay: threshold for triggering collective redundancy obligations
items.summary: We are seeking views on the level and methods by which the new organisation-wide threshold for triggering collective redundancy obligations might be set.

items.title: Transparency data: DESNZ: spending over £25,000, August 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.title: Make Work Pay: protection from detriments for taking industrial action
items.summary: We are seeking views on the types of detriments that employers should be prohibited from imposing on workers for taking industrial action.

items.title: Statutory guidance: Reference Documents for The Customs Tariff (Preferential Trade Arrangements) (EU Exit) Regulations 2020
items.summary: Find the UK’s preferential tariffs and Rules of Origin for the agreements contained within the Customs Tariff (Preferential Trade Arrangements and Tariff Quotas) (Amendment) (EU Exit) Regulations 2020.

items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.summary: Spending by electronic purchasing card solution (ePCS), over £500.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £500, October 2025
items.summary: Spending by electronic purchasing card solution (ePCS), over £500.

items.title: Capture Redress Scheme: applying for someone else
items.summary: How to apply to the Capture Redress Scheme on behalf of a postmaster who cannot apply for themselves.

items.title: Statutory guidance: Feed in Tariffs (FITs) determinations
items.summary: Determinations legally required for administration of the Feed-in Tariffs scheme.

items.title: Notice: Green Gas Support Scheme (GGSS): expenditure forecast statements and tariff change notices
items.summary: GGSS quarterly year-ahead expenditure forecast and degression threshold comparison, and, when applicable, notification of tariff changes.

items.title: Dr Ros Rivaz appointed as new Chair of Companies House
items.summary: Ministers confirm that Dr Ros Rivaz will take on the role from 1 March.

items.title: Guidance: Household Energy Efficiency statistics methodology note
items.summary: Methodology note and background quality report accompanying statistical releases on Household Energy Efficiency Statistics.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK total energy
items.summary: Data on overall energy balances of energy supply and demand in the United Kingdom.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK solid fuels and derived gases
items.summary: Data on coal and coal-related products, including production, trade, consumption and stocks.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK oil and oil products
items.summary: Data on oil and oil products, including upstream production and UK refinery activity, trade, stocks and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK gas
items.summary: Data on the UK's gas sector, including production, trade and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK electricity
items.summary: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends and Prices statistical release: 26 February 2026
items.summary: The latest provisional monthly energy production, trade, electricity generation, consumption and prices statistics produced by the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

items.title: Consultation on the National Survey of Registered Businesses (NSRB)
items.summary: The government is seeking views on the proposed changes to the DBT National Survey of Registered Businesses’ exporting behaviours, attitudes and needs.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK weather
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly data on weather patterns, including temperature, heating degree days, wind speeds, sun hours and rainfall.

items.title: Comparisons of international road fuel prices
items.summary: Comparisons of road fuel prices against other EU countries, using data from the European Commission Oil Bulletin.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Household Energy Efficiency Statistics, headline release February 2026
items.summary: Household Energy Efficiency Statistics, headline release (February 2026).

items.title: Official Statistics: Social Housing Decarbonisation Fund statistics: February 2026
items.summary: Data to monitor the installation of energy efficiency measures in domestic properties via the Social Housing Decarbonisation Fund (SHDF) scheme in England.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Solar photovoltaics deployment
items.summary: Monthly deployment of all solar photovoltaic capacity in the United Kingdom.

items.title: Official Statistics: Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics: January 2026
items.summary: Statistical release on Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics for the estimation of capital grant uptake to support the installations of low carbon technologies in domestic and non-domestic buildings.

items.title: Policy paper: Government response to the Home-Based Working Select Committee report
items.summary: UK government response to the recommendations and report made by the House of Lords Select Committee on home-based working.

items.title: Independent report: Automotive Transformation Fund (ATF): process evaluation
items.summary: This independent report evaluates whether the ATF is being implemented as intended and whether the design is working effectively.

items.title: Research: Advanced Propulsion Centre (APC): impact evaluation
items.summary: This independent evaluation assesses the impact of the Advanced Propulsion Centre (APC) core competition for automotive research and development grant funding.

items.title: Independent report: Automotive Transformation Fund (ATF): evaluation framework
items.summary: This independent report sets out the evaluation framework for the process and impact evaluation of the ATF.

items.title: Research: Automotive Transformation Fund (ATF): baseline exercise
items.summary: This baseline report provides benchmark values for key metrics measured before, or in the early implementation period, of the ATF.

items.title: Research: The changing value and structure of the UK manufacturing sector
items.summary: A study of the manufacturing sector using UK and international analytical evidence and practices, academic literature and global policy experience.

items.title: Research: UK battery sector: mapping research
items.summary: Key findings from a research project building a methodology to map the UK battery sector and compiling a database of UK battery sector companies.

items.title: Research: Aerospace Technology Institute programme: impact evaluation
items.summary: This independent report evaluates the impacts of the Aerospace Technology Institute (ATI) programme funding.

items.title: Corporate report: Grenfell Tower Inquiry Government Annual Report: February 2026
items.summary: Annual Report on the government’s progress in implementing the Grenfell Tower Inquiry Phase 2 recommendations.
